DOC.HEADLINE: BASEBALL STRIKE ; DAY 1
DOC.TEXT: At the outset of the sport ' s eighth work_stoppage , negotiators for the players and owners agreed to accept federal mediation to try to resolve their collective_bargaining stalemate.Neither side seemed optimistic of a quick_fix . Further negotiations are unlikely until both sides meet with the mediator , who can only urge a settlement , not enforce one . A similar attempt was unsuccessful during a 50-day strike in 1981 . * Main story : A1
